artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of fundamental redesign options for full biconditional TruthLemma - concludes temporal backward is fundamentally impossible due to omega-rule

partial_progress.details: Research completed. Full biconditional TruthLemma is NOT achievable for temporal operators (omega-rule limitation). Modal backward can be fixed via Zorn proof completion. Current architecture is correct - completeness only needs forward direction.

findings.reason_temporal: Omega-rule limitation - cannot derive universal from infinitely many instances in finitary proof system
findings.reason_modal: Technical challenge with Zorn's lemma formalization, not fundamental impossibility

recommendations: Complete Zorn proof in SaturatedConstruction.lean to eliminate modal axiom
Document temporal backward sorries as fundamental omega-rule limitation
DO NOT pursue temporal backward - mathematically impossible
Current forward-only architecture is correct for publication
